content: sunflower cup coasters by erica townsend designs owner of gracie s petals & bows materials worsted weight yarn- i used bernat super value bright yellow dark yellow and choc brown darning needle 3 5mm hook scissors gauge 9 single_crochet x 11 row = 2 x 2 terms bobble- bobble stitch this bobble stitch is made up with 3dc worked together as one stitch like a decreased stitch in the same hole single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch repeat = * double_crochet- double_crochet treble_crochet- treble_crochet or triple crochet ch2 picot- chain 2 picot stitch half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet instructions round 1 working in continuous rounds using brown yarn and 3 5mm hook chain 2 work 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 8 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in every st around 16 single_crochet round 3 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 24 single_crochet round 4 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts * repeat from * to * around 32 single_crochet round 5 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts * repeat from * to * around 40 single_crochet round 6 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts * repeat from * to * around 48 single_crochet round 7 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 5 sts * repeat from * to * around 56 single_crochet round 8 single_crochet in every st around 56 single_crochet fasten_off and switch to dark yellow yarn round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in same as chain 1 *bobble in next st single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around end with a slip_stitch in top of 1st single_crochet fasten_off round 10 attach bright yellow yarn to front loop only on one of the bobble sts from previous round and work all sts from this round in front loops only *ch1 half_double_crochet in same as ch1 work a double_crochet and treble_crochet in next st ch2 picot image on next page on how to do this treble_crochet and double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet and slip_stitch in next st slip_stitch to next st* repeat from * to * around fasten of and hide all ends hope you enjoyed this pattern
